 ) }; const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { socialMediaPageSelected : state.socialMediaR.socialMediaPageSelected, agentsProjects: state.agentsR.agentsProjects, agentsSelectedProject: state.agentsR.agentsSelectedProject, agentsProjectLogs: state.agentsR.agentsProjectLogs, agentsCommentsMatched: state.agentsR.agentsCommentsMatched, agentsCommentsNotMatched: state.agentsR.agentsCommentsMatched, } }; export default connect(mapStateToProps, { getLogs })(MyAgentsMessages);
